snippet: Animal Care and Control of New York, the nonprofit group that cares for the city’s stray and unwanted animals, has administered unsafe drugs and stored vaccines improperly, the comptroller said.
abstract: Audit by New York City Comptroller Scott M Stringer reveals faulty practices by Animal Care and Control of New York, nonprofit group that cares for city's stray and unwanted animals; finds that group administered unsafe drugs and stored vaccines improperly.
lead_paragraph: Animal Care and Control of New York, the nonprofit group that cares for the city’s stray and unwanted animals, has administered unsafe drugs and stored vaccines improperly, the comptroller said.

headline.main: Animals Put at Risk in New York City’s Shelters, Audit Finds
headline.print_headline: Animals in the City’s Shelters Put at Risk, an Audit Finds

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Animal Care and Control of New York City
